Malden.Mugar Omni Theater:
The Mugar Omni Theater is a domed IMAX theater at the Museum of Science, in Boston, Massachusetts.


== Description ==
The Mugar Omni is named after Stephen P. Mugar, the founder of Star Market, and his wife Marian G. Mugar. The Mugar Omni is non-profit and opened in 1987.
